title.rendered: “IDF Apprehends Suspected Terrorist Behind Dahariya Stabbing Attack: A Safety Warning for Israelis Entering Area A”

content.rendered:
IDF spokesperson:

The IDF forces arrested the terrorist suspected of stabbing an Israeli citizen earlier today in Dahariya.

Earlier today (Saturday), a stabbing incident was reported in the city of Dahariya (Area A) in the Judea brigade. Following an initial investigation, it was determined that it was a terrorist attack in which an Israeli citizen who entered the city was stabbed. The citizen was evacuated to receive medical treatment in a hospital.

The terrorist was arrested a short while ago by IDF reserve forces and was transferred for further investigation by security forces.

We would like to emphasize that entry into Area A is prohibited and dangerous for Israelis.
